alert.note: Alert for Marshall (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:54PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GREENE AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1054 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moundsville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Aleppo, New Freeport, Rocklick, Lone Oak, Glen Easton, Beelers Station, and Grove Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for southwestern Pennsylvania...and northern West Virginia.
